name: architecture
description: I design scalable, maintainable software using clean code principles, layered architecture, and modern design patterns.

name: Coding
description: I write clean, error-resistant code using design patterns, algorithms, typing and all best practices for a maintainable code

name: Web Design
description: I like to build aestetics sites with good user experience (UX) with the focus on the data and information to be displayed.

name: Data Mining
description: I extract, analyze, and model data using exploratory data analysis(EDA), machine learning, and data visualization techniques.

name: Visualization
description: I create clear exploratory and explanatory visuals using tools like D3 and Chart.js to make data insightful with good data visualization principles allowing data to speak for themself and tell us a story.

name: Security
description: I secure applications through authentication, encryption, input validation, and end-to-end data integrity.

name: Web scraping
description: I scrape static and dynamic sites using Scrapy, Selenium, Playwright, and BeautifulSoup for custom data extraction.
